com.tutego.jrtf

Class RtfText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tutego.jrtf.RtfText

  • public class RtfText
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for RTF text with different text formattings like bold, italic, ...

    • Method Detail

      • text

        public static RtfText text(java.lang.Object... texts)
        Converts every object in the sequence with toString to a String object and wraps it into a RtfText if its not already a RtfText object. If the argument is null or no elements are given the result is equal to text(""). If one element of the vararg is null then this element is omitted and no separating space will be written too.
        Parameters:
        texts - Sequence of text.
        Returns:
        New RtfText object representing this sequence of text.

      • text

        public static RtfText text(boolean joinWithSpace,
           java.lang.Object... texts)
        Converts every object in the sequence with toString to a String object and wraps it into a RtfText if its not already a RtfText object and join every text with a space between if wanted. If the argument is null or no elements are given the result is equal to text(""). If one element of the vararg is null then this element is omitted and no separating space will be written too.
        Parameters:
        joinWithSpace - If space character should be set between non null elements.
        texts - Sequence of text.
        Returns:
        New RtfText object representing this sequence of text.

      • text

        public static RtfText text(java.lang.String text)
        Wraps a String in a RtfText object. If the argument is a null value then it will be treated like a "".
        Parameters:
        text - String
        Returns:
        New RtfText object representing this text.

        public static RtfText font(int fontnum,
           java.lang.Object text)
        Sets text with a given font style.
        Parameters:

        text - Text to set with a different font.
        Returns:
        New RtfText object representing this text.
